name: Make It Slip
description:
Make it slip

Take over the role of a penguin followed by a pair of wildlife photographers, looking for their perfect shot. Make sure to pose and keep your environment in check to line up their ultimate photo shooting with you as their star!

Try to hold on to the high expectations of your paparazzi in this cute but stressful top down action game!

Controls
  • Movement - WASD or Arrow Keys
  • Next Dialogue - Enter or Space

Please make sure to play it in fullscreen, best at 16:9 aspect ratio.

Credits

This game was made in 42 hours as part of a university game jam with the jam theme "Make it stop" by:

Team: Meine Favoriten

  • The Fifth King / Discord: The Fifth King#0005 / Design Lead, Programming and Voice Acting
  • SpyPlayer / Discord: Marvin#4012 / Programming Lead and Design
  • UsefulCompanion / Discord: UsefulCompanion#7607 / Character and UI Art
  • Amalia / Discord: Amalia#7728 / Environment Art and Level Design

All assets used were made during the jam by us and in close collaboration with our friend:

  • Ryanocerou5 // Music and Sound
